org.springframework.integration.http.inbound

Class CrossOrigin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.integration.http.inbound.CrossOrigin

  • public class CrossOrigin
extends Object
    The mapping to permit cross origin requests (CORS) for HttpRequestHandlingEndpointSupport. Provides direct mapping in terms of functionality compared to CrossOrigin.
    Since:
    4.2
    Author:
    Artem Bilan
    See Also:
    CrossOrigin, IntegrationRequestMappingHandlerMapping
